# Mławka, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

| subdivision_type1 = Voivodeship

Mławka  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Iłowo-Osada, within Działdowo County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  south-east of Iłowo-Osada,  south-east of Działdowo, and  south of the regional capital Olsztyn.
